price: E pergunta aos que, de Nossos Mensageiros, enviamos, antes de ti: "Se Nós fizemos, além dO Misericordioso, deuses, para serem adorados?"
arabic: وَسۡـَٔلۡ مَنۡ أَرۡسَلۡنَا مِن قَبۡلِكَ مِن رُّسُلِنَآ أَجَعَلۡنَا مِن دُونِ ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنِ ءَالِهَةٗ يُعۡبَدُونَ

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: wasal man arsalnā min qablika min rusulinā ajaʿalnā min dūni al-raḥmāni ālihatan yuʿ'badūna
